author: cnbc.com
title: HP Inc. to Announce First Fiscal Year 2018 Earnings on February 22, 2018
text:
PALO ALTO, Calif., HP Inc. (NYSE:HPQ) will present a live audio webcast of a conference call to review financial results for the first fiscal quarter ended January 31, 2018 on Thursday, February 22, 2018 at 5:35 p.m. ET / 2:35 p.m. PT.
The webcast will be available at www.hp.com/investor/2018Q1Webcast . A replay of the audio webcast will be available at the same website shortly after the call and will remain available for approximately one year.
About HP Inc.
HP Inc. creates technology that makes life better for everyone, everywhere. Through our portfolio of printers, PCs, mobile devices, solutions, and services, we engineer experiences that amaze. More information about HP (NYSE:HPQ) is available at http://www.hp.com .
